name: Dongying Shengli New Zealand School
description:
Shengli-New Zealand School is a full-time high school which was co-founded in 2003 by Shandong ShengDe Education Investment Co., Ltd., Shandong Shengli Education Industry Development Co., Ltd., and New Zealand EdPAC Co., Ltd. It is the first international school in Shandong Province that is cooperated with New Zealand. It is located in Dongying City where the Yellow River joins into the sea. Dongying is one of the most rapidly developing areas in China, with a pleasant environment and a convenient transportation.

We now have around 500 students including about 100 international students living in our beautiful and well-equipped campus. Satisfactory guaranteed service of studying abroad We help students to apply for visas, picking up the students when they firstly arrive in foreign countries, arranging the accommodation and following their study. Our service is professional, safe, quick and economical. Our school has a high quality English course, 100% IETLS passing rate and 100% visa passing rate.

School Characteristics:

1.   Shengli-New Zealand School offers both boarding and day-student educations, aims at the integrity of students’ personalities and their mental health, and encourages our students to be self-respect, self-discipline, confident, and independent.

2.  Small-class teaching which limits the size of every class under 36 students allows us to provide education according to each of our student’s individual differences. Each and every student can be appreciated and taken care of by their teachers.

3.   A combination of eastern and western concepts is applied in teaching so that the students can benefit from the advanced educational methods.

4.    Covering all the basic subjects while putting particular emphasis on the English coursework, we provide mandatory courses as well as extracurricular instructions. We educate in accordance with students’ unique differences, and concentrate on consolidating the basic courses. Our local and foreign teachers cooperate in teaching English for both senior and junior students in order to improve their abilities in listening, speaking, reading and writing.

5.  Attaching importance to students’ overall competitiveness both inside and outside of the classroom, Students can broaden their horizons, strengthen their abilities, and enhance their character.

6. There are lots of interesting extracurricular activities and international communication activities. School Events such as Christmas party, sports meeting, spring tour, mountain-area visits, and Christmas festival are held every year. There are also all kinds of clubs and organizations including science, music, dance, drawing, handwriting, chess, basketball, and table tennis. Students can attend programs in Australia, United States, New-Zealand, Singapore and other countries for study tours, visiting world famous schools, experiencing study abroad and comprehending Western culture. It is a stage to gain an acquaintance with foreign universities for those who have the intention of studying abroad.

International classes

The classes are small, no more than 20 students. Chinese teachers and foreign native English teachers work co-operatively, which helps students improve their ability in listening, speaking, reading, and writing rapidly. IETLS course: we have special courses for students who need to pass the IETLS to study abroad. This course helps students have good marks in the exam in order to meet the requirement of foreign universities.

name: East City Shane School
description:
About Dongying

Dongying is located on the banks of the Yellow River Delta of Northern Shandong Province. The city was established in 1983, as a base for developing the Yellow River Delta and China's second largest oilfield, Shengli Field. Although, the city is relatively new in Chinese standard, it has grown exponentially due to its oil reserves.

Enjoying a temperate monsoon climate, the area has four distinct seasons. It is windy and lacking in rainfall in the spring, while heat and torrid temperatures, along with the rainfall, are mainly concentrated in the summer.

The beauty of Dongying lies in its relaxed lifestyle. The people of Dongying are incredibly friendly and will go out of their way to be helpful. While the city is small, there is a great deal to do. Travelers always find themselves staying longer than they intended.

Reasons why Shane English Dongying is right for you

  • A great work environment.
  • Free Chinese lesson
  • Incredibly helpful staff
  • Small-town China lifestyle, with lots to see and do.
  • Easy travel to nearby Qingdao, Jinan and Beijing

The School

Shane English Dongying has three branches in the city with plans to expand. The main branch is located on Jinan Road in the city centers. The schools have about 20 full time foreign teachers in total and continue to grow at a rapid pace.

The other branches are located in or near shopping malls in other districts. The schools are within easy traveling distance of each other, although teachers are not usually expected to travel between these schools. Each school has spacious classrooms with lots of resources to make your teaching experience a pleasant one. Each class has a Teacher’s Assistance and student numbers are limited to 16.

name: English First (EF) West City
description:
Dongying is a little city in the north of Shandong province which is an eastern province of China. Over the past 20 years since its establishment, Dongying has witnessed leap-forward development, which has attracted attention from home and abroad. Dongying ranked 27th among “Top 100 Cities of China” in terms of comprehensive economical strength. Dongying city is a “State Clean City” and “National Model City for Environmental Protection.” Shopping centers, supermarkets, hotels, and medical care facilities are easily accessible, providing convenience for your daily life at home and at work. It has rich natural resources and is known as an oil city in China and abroad. It is the birthplace and main production area of the Shengli Oilfield, China’s second-largest base of the petroleum industry.

EF’s English language schools are spread across China in over 50 cities. Teach English at our kids & teens schools, adult centers or at our online facility. Our schools are filled with the resources you need to be a great teacher. From internet-connected classrooms to lesson planning materials, you’ll be set from day one. Are you ready for the job of a life time? ESL jobs in China are unlike any professional experience. While your work hours and location might be unusual, you’ll be able to travel on weekends to exotic locations and learn a new language while teaching students who are engaged and active participants. 

About EF English First

EF English First is the world’s leading privately owned education company. Founded in 1965, EF operates in over 50 countries around the world. We have vacancies for teaching positions across China so if you prefer the fast paced city life like Shanghai, or want to be immersed in the more traditional culture of a smaller city, we probably have the position for you. We have both Kids & Teens schools and Adult schools in over 60 Cities in China.

Teaching at English First

At English First, you’ll be provided the resources to become the best teacher you can be. Our new and colorful classrooms offer state-of-the-art technology including Internet connected computers, interactive whiteboards and iPads. We also offer a world-class teacher development program with certification courses exclusively for our teachers to help them move into more senior positions within EF.

name: China Shengli College (University of Petroleum)
description:
The China University of Petroleum is a university system in China. It consists of two universities: China University of Petroleum (East China), located in Qingdao and Dongying, and China University of Petroleum (Beijing), located in Beijing. Both are regarded as the best universities in the field of petroleum related subjects in China. They are placed under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Education.
It moved to Dongying, Shandong Province in 1969 and its name changed to Huadong Petroleum Institute. In 1988, it was renamed The University of Petroleum consisting of one part in Dongying as the college and one in Beijing as the graduate school. Each gradually developed into universities with both undergraduate and graduate students. In January 2005, its name changed to China University of Petroleum. 

In 2004, China University of Petroleum (East China) began to move to Qingdao, and completed the relocation in 2012. Dongying campus currently serves as the base for continuing education, remote education, research laboratories, and industry collaboration. China University of Petroleum specializes in upstream, midstream and downstream petroleum science and engineering, in the overall level of domestic lead. Its five national key specialties are: 

  • Chemical Engineering and Technology
  • Mineral Resources Prospecting and Exploration
  • Oil and Gas Well Engineering
  • Oil and Gas Storage and Transportation Engineering
  • Oil and Gas Field Development Engineering

name: Yellow River Bilingual School
description:
The school

Yellow River Bilingual School is located in Dongying City, Shandong Province, China (see Google Map above). We have a student population of approximately 1,100 ranging from kindergarten to grade five. Our campus includes facilities such as a cafeteria (serving free breakfast, lunch, and dinner 5 days a week), a foreign teachers office, basketball courts, ping-pong tables, and a running track encircling a football field.

Most of our students are very hardworking and dedicated learners. Our students are generally well behaved and fun to work with. Our class sizes range from the low-twenties to mid-thirties, with an average of 30 per class (which is considered low compared to Chinese public schools that are typically 40-50 students per class).

The Office

There is also a foreign teacher office with individual desks for teachers to use. The office is stocked with basic supplies (chalk, construction paper, paper cutter, etc.) that our teachers are free to use as they see fit. We also have office printers available for printing supplemental material and a coffee maker (of course). Although we encourage teachers to use the office for lesson planning and storing teaching materials, the choice is ultimately yours as we have NO mandated office hours.

We also provide free on campus housing to foreign teachers in a separate building from the rest of the school. We provide our teachers with appliances such as: an air conditioner, water cooler, flat-screen TV, armoire, mini-refrigerator, microwave, and water heater. We also provide free water (both bottled and tap), electricity, gas, and heating in the winter so you never need to worry about paying for rent or utilities for the entire duration of your stay! The room contains a main bedroom, a small kitchenette, and a bathroom with a shower. 

There is a shared laundry room, a shared common room with sofas and a Nintendo Wii as well as a larger shared kitchen with a gas stove, toaster oven, rice cooker, pots/pans, plates/bowls, and cutlery for teachers to use.

Your classroom will be equipped with a large flat-screen television (with a USB port to display pictures/play music), a projector (to display flashcards/song lyrics) and a blackboard as well as a bulletin board at the back of the classroom. All classrooms also have radiator heaters for the winter, as well as an air conditioner/heater.

name: Shengli Number 1 High School
description: Shengli Oilfield Number 1 Middle School (actually a high school for students aged 16-18) is located in the Yellow River Delta, in Dongying City, an emerging oil industry city. The school is the first provincial standardized school. It covers an area of ​​143 square meters, a building area of 50,000 square meters, 62 classes and 3167 students as well as a staff of 289 people.

name: Jing An Shane English School
description:
About Shanghai

Shanghai, often referred to as "Paris of the Orient" or "Pearl of China", is perhaps the most well known city in all of China. As the largest and most prosperous city in the nation, Shanghai is the economic, financial and cultural center of China and rivals cities like London and New York in terms of tourism.

Modern and fast paced, it is a city rich in history and culture waiting to be explored. Even though Shanghai is one of the most populous cities on the planet, the crowds here are much more manageable due to the fact that the city is spread over a large area.

Visitors are most frequently surprised by just how fashionable Shanghai is. New museums, galleries, restaurants and bars have emerged keep adding to already large selection of venues. This cosmopolitan cultural scene harks back to the heydays of the 1920s and 30s when Shanghai made a name for itself.

The School

Shane English has three branches in Shanghai. These are located in the Jing An, Changning and Yangpu districts of Shanghai. All schools are conveniently located and within easy reach of the subway line. The schools utilize a number of technologies, alongside traditional ESL teaching methods to provide a superior quality learning experience.

Classrooms are spacious, clean and air-conditioned and fitted with a variety of tools such as interactive boards, computers, or overhead projectors. All schools are fully equipped with teachers’ resources (books, toys, games, flashcards, computers, printers, copiers, etc.) to utilize alongside their natural talents to conduct effective and fun classes.

Reasons why Shane English Shanghai is right for you

  • A relaxed and supportive work environment.
  • A professional company that appreciates its staff.
  • All our teachers have legal work visas with no hassles.
  • We are always completely upfront with our teachers.
  • Live in one of the most amazing cities in the world.
  • Easy travel throughout China and Asia.

Courses offered

Shane offers constant training and development through regular workshops and sessions with senior teachers.We also offer our in house Teaching Development Scheme, which is designed for those teachers who have been with the company for 9 months and want to take the next step in their career and development. In addition to TDS, Shane has built its own online training platform, filled with presentations and articles all designed to help a teacher learn and develop their skills.

Of course, no language school in China would be complete without Chinese lessons. These can be arranged on request through one of our Chinese members of staff.

name: Suzhou Shane English School
description:
Introduction

If you’ve been looking into coming to China to teach, you’ll probably have seen the phrase “Above there is heaven, below there is Suzhou and Hangzhou.” Suzhou is China’s garden city, and the Venice of China. It is known for its many gardens and canals and attracts a large number of tourists from nearby Shanghai, and all over China.

Suzhou is also a very livable city. It’s size (around 10 million people call Suzhou home) and proximity to Shanghai (half an hour by high-speed rail) mean that western conveniences are relatively easy to find (There is a H&M, M&S, TGIF), but you can also lead a quite traditional Chinese lifestyle, eating baozi for breakfast from the street food guy outside your apartment, for example.

Like many modern Chinese cities, Suzhou is big, fast-paced and bustling, while maintaining the traditional tranquil gardens that made it famous. The school is located close to Suzhou’s Central Park, just a short distance from the traditional downtown area – easily accessible by a brand new subway line.

Reasons why Shane English Suzhou is right for you

  • A relaxed and supportive work environment.
  • A professional company that appreciates its staff.
  • All our teachers have legal work visas with no hassles.
  • We are always completely upfront with our teachers.
  • Live in one of the most amazing cities in the world.
  • Easy travel throughout China and Asia.

The school

Shane English has two branches in Suzhou. These are located just a short walk from each other in the Central Park area of Suzhou. Both schools are conveniently located and within easy reach of the subway line. The schools utilize a number of technologies, alongside traditional ESL teaching methods to provide a superior quality learning experience.

Courses offered

Shane offers constant training and development through regular workshops and sessions with senior teachers.We also offer our in house Teaching Development Scheme, which is designed for those teachers who have been with the company for 9 months and want to take the next step in their career and development. In addition to TDS, Shane has built its own online training platform, filled with presentations and articles all designed to help a teacher learn and develop their skills.

name: Jinjiang Shane English School
description:
Home of the giant pandas, Chengdu also serves as the capital of Sichuan Province. It is easy to see why Chengdu is often referred to as the Heavenly State. The city is surrounded by natural beauty and is situated located in the west of the Sichuan Basin. The greater city area is now home to more than 14 million people. Chengdu has the reputation as a very "laid-back" city that emphasizes culture and relaxation. It is credited with a good nightlife scene and contains many new western style buildings in the large city centre.

Summer weather is hot and humid, as the city is surrounded by small mountains to the east and sits in the Red Basin. Furthermore, an hour to the west lie the foothills of the mighty Tibetan Plateau and the fabulously scenic mountains of west Sichuan.

The School

Shane English has three branches in Chengdu. These are located in the Jinjiang, Chenghua and Qingyang districts of Chengdu. All schools are conveniently located in/nearby downtown within easy reach of the BRT and subway line. The schools themselves are modern and spacious and the number of students is limited to give each student enough attention. The school staff excels at their jobs and has a wonderful knack of making new teachers feel at home. The schools ensures that there is one Teaching Assistant in each class to help you should the need arise.

Places of interest and Things to do

Living in Chengdu is great fun and there are always lots to do. Besides the amazing places of interest, the city offers a lot inviting activities for visitors and expats. Sampling the famous Sichuan food is a must here. The hot and spicy dishes and varied tasty snacks are sure to whip up your appetite. Go shopping at the Chunxi Road, spend a leisurely afternoon in a teahouse, and watch a Sichuan Opera performance at night – this would be a perfect day giving you a deeper understanding of this charming city.

Hang out at Tianfu Square (one of many in Chengdu) and take in an elaborate water show, synchronized to music or visit Chengdu Zoo to get a glimpse of those famous giant pandas. There are also a number of theme parks which can make for a fun day out. Chengdu has a vast array of bars and clubs and range from uniquely Chinese to very Western. Work your way from Shamrock pub to Poly Center, currently Chengdu's hottest club and bar area.

name: Yuxi Shane English School
description:
Yuxi is situated right in the heart of Yunnan, considered by many to be the most beautiful province in China. The province is brimming with beautiful clear lakes, continuous spring-like weather, vibrant cities and truly amazing people. The population of Yunnan is one of the most diverse in China which includes dozens ethnic minority groups. Yuxi is perfectly located for travelling and absorbing this wonderful province with Dali, Lijiang and Jinghong all a bus ride away. Travelling outside of the province is also a breeze with Vietnam, Laos, Thailand and Cambodia all in close proximity, this makes having breakfast in Yuxi and lunch in Vietnam a very real possibility

People describing Yuxi tend to come up with the phrase ‘not too big, not too small’, this is a perfect fit. The city is big enough that you can get many of the home comforts that you miss from the supermarket and enjoy some western food at a number of western restaurants. It’s also small enough that you don’t feel like a sardine stuffed in a can whilst walking down the street.

The school

Founded in Shanghai in 2000, Shane English School China (S.E.S.C), currently operates over 30 Schools in over 24 different cities throughout the whole of China. Shane English School, Yuxi was established in July 2008 and has become one of the best and most effective English schools in Yunnan province.

Here in Yuxi we have an ongoing commitment to the support and development of our teachers and students alike. We pride ourselves on how well we look after our teachers both inside and outside of the school and provide a professional, well organized and relaxing work environment. Our modern, well equipped school, excellent teaching materials and engaging learning environment means that our present staff compliment of 7 native English speaking teachers can easily help the children to achieve the highest educational standard possible.

Currently, our school houses over 600 students. Ages range from 4 - 14 years old and our students’ English levels start from Complete Beginners going as high as Upper Intermediate level. Class sizes vary between 6 - 14 students and are divided according to age and ability. All of our teachers are guaranteed a broad range of classes representing the development and progression of our students. Our school has a very good standing in the Yuxi community and has the well earned reputation of being the best English school in the city.

Shane English School, Yuxi is currently the only native speaking English school in Yuxi. We’ve been growing at a steady pace since opening in 2008. Since 2008 the focus has been placed on quality and constantly striving to improve the teaching quality and deliver the very best standard of teaching to our students. Because of the hard work and dedication to this, we now operate within a highly productive learning environment with exceptionally high teaching standards. Our ‘education first’ mentality and dedication to giving our students the very best education possible means that our students outperform other students at their local schools – across the board!

Places of interest and things to do

Yuxi is the home town of the famous musician Nie Er, the man responsible for writing the Chinese national anthem ‘March of the Volunteers’, there are many memorials and parks dedicated to Nie Er, the main one being Nie Er music square, a beautiful park with fresh water ponds, beautiful green grass,a man made beach and the main attraction, a large, elevated statue of Nie Er which rolls down in to a giant violin.

Fu xian lake is the third largest in Yunnan and the third deepest in China, located just outside of the city this stunning lake is a great way to spend a sunny day. The old town area is a fascinating area filled with old style buildings, temples, restaurants and street vendors. Any walk through this bustling quadrant is sure to fill anyone with a sense of excitement. Yuxi has a countless number of hot springs which vary from hot spring swimming pools to clusters of individual small pools fit for a few people, the perfect way to relax after a busy day teaching

name: Zhichunlu Shane English School
description:
Shane English School Zhichunlu is a direct training establishment (DTE) meaning it is owned by the Shane organisation. It is also the headquarters for the company’s operations in northern and southern China. The capital of China has a great range of ancient culture and modern entertainment to enjoy. Here you will find friendly people, delicious food and a comfortable yet affordable standard of living. We are looking for individuals who are friendly, outgoing, culturally inquisitive, and enjoy working with young children . All of our schools are located near the heart of the city. For teachers looking to stay on past their initial contracts, there are opportunities for career development and advancement to senior management roles.

Our Classes:

Young learners (children aged 3-12) are our primary age range of students, however we also provide a number of private classes to older, more advanced students. Teachers are able to utilise their Teaching English to Young Learners (TEYL) training that they receivewhen they first arrive in China, as well as other TEFL methodologies and training that they have acquired through TEFL certification when teaching the older learners. This variety of age ranges means that teachers are able to hone their skills in teaching young learners, but also experience teaching other age ranges.

Our Location:

Located 5 minutes away from the station for lines 10 and 13, Zhichunlu, we are within reach of the heart of the city, but outside the main areas of commotion in the rush hours. Being located near the trasfer station of Lines 10 and 13 allows teachers great convenience in accessing various parts of the city, whether it be the visiting the famous ancient sitea or the more international areas such as Sanlintun (40 mins by subway). Of particlar interest to teachers, just one station to the north, is Wudaoku (5 mins by subway). This is area popular with international students studying in the numerous universities located in the Haidian district and contains a number of student friendly bars and affordable restaurants. The Haidian district also contains a large number of popular tourist destinations including the old and new summer palaces, Beijing zoo, and fragrant hills scenic area.

In the school's immediate vicinity, there is a large Wal-mart store next to the school where all manner of items can be purchased including imported products. There are a wide variety of nearby restaurants to go to or that can deliver to your home. For teachers chooosing accomodation near the school, a couple of gyms are 20-30 minutes walk away, both include swimming pools and a variety of classes. Membership costs between 3,000- 3,600 yuan per year. A number of cheaper gyms are in Wudaoku.

name: Xisanqi Shane English School
description:
The Xisanqi school has been open since 2013 and has established itself in this residential community as a location for young learners to develop their English. It caters mostly to students aged 4 - 12 years old, and is 50 minutes away by subway from our Head Office school in Zhichunlu.

Our Location:

Situated in the northern suburbs of Beijing, the school is a 10 minute bus ride from Yuxin station on line 8. The school is in a residential area, which has cheaper accommodation costs than other parts of Beijing, but is near to subway line 8 which  goes directly into the heart of Beijing. This makes it convenient to live in the quieter, more affordable area of Beijing, whilst still having access to Beijing's main attractions. The greeen Olympic line (line 8) goes past many of the Olympic venues including the Olympic stadium, and into the hutong areas of Dongcheng near the Forbidden City.

name: Huilongguan Shane English School
description:
The School:

Shane English School Huilongguan is a franchise school of Shane English School Beijing.  The Huilongguan school is new, having opened in 2015. Most of its classes are young learners, aged 4 upwards, but it is also planning to introduce one or two courses for adults. It is located in a residential community in the north of Changping district of northern Beijing. It is close to Longze subway station on Line 13, and is around 30 minutes from Head Office.

Beijing has a great variety of ancient culture and modern activities to enjoy. The local people are friendly, food is delicious, and on a teacher's salary you can afford a comfortable standard of living. Huilongguan school is looking for energetic, outgoing, friendly teachers who enjoy working with all ages of children. An interest in using art and music in the classroom would be very welcome. There may be opportunities for teachers completing their initial year to take on additional roles such as Senior Teacher.

Reasons why Shane English Beijing is right for you

  • A relaxed and supportive work environment.
  • A professional company that appreciates its staff.
  • All our teachers have legal work visas with no hassles.
  • We are always completely upfront with our teachers.
  • Live in one of the most amazing cities in the world.
  • Easy travel throughout China and Asia.

Courses offered

Shane offers constant training and development through regular workshops and sessions with senior teachers.We also offer our in house Teaching Development Scheme, which is designed for those teachers who have been with the company for 9 months and want to take the next step in their career and development. In addition to TDS, Shane has built its own online training platform, filled with presentations and articles all designed to help a teacher learn and develop their skills.

Of course, no language school in China would be complete without Chinese lessons. These can be arranged on request through one of our Chinese members of staff.

name: Huadu Shane English School
description:
Huadu School is the newest Shane school in China, having opened in mid-July 2015. The school is a franchise school and is managed by the owners, Chris and Merry, both of whom speak English and who have studied and worked in Europe. They are looking to satisfy the growing demand in the city for English classes.

Our Classes:

The age range of the students at Huadu varies from Kindergarten, through Elementary to High school students, providing a variety of classes in a working week. The school has only recently opened and having already recruited a number of students, is still increasing its student base, opening new classes and looking for additional teachers.

Our Location:

Huadu is a growing city, with its nearby proximity to Guangzhou International Airport and Guangzhou city making it a popular destination for commuters with young families to live. The school is located about 20 minutes by car from Huadu city centre in a growing residential area. There are frequent buses into the city centre from bus stops near to the school.

The surrounding area is constantly developing, with the city’s largest shopping mall due to open nearby in 2016, and an extension to the Guangzhou/Hong Kong subway under construction. In the immediate vicinity of the school, the new apartment complexes provide many convenience stores and restaurants, a gym and a  swimming pool. There aren’t many other foreigners currently in Huadu, although there are a number of bars, clubs, KTVS (karaoke bars) and restaurants. Instead of staying in Huadu, teachers looking for more foreign-centric nightlife may choose to spend their rest days in nearby Guangzhou, Hong Kong or Macao. Huadu has buses to any number of neighbouring cities, which can be caught from the International Airport, or from downtown Huadu.

The new apartment complexes built nearby provide spacious affordable living. The average rent for a 2-3 bedroom apartment is around 2,000 RMB. Teachers have the option to share in one of the existing school rented apartments or to take the accommodation allowance. Eating and living in Huadu is affordable, allowing teachers to save or spend their rest days in other nearby cities.

Travelling to Hong Kong:

To travel to Mong Kok in Kowloon, Hong Kong, takes about 3 hours 15 minutes by bus from the New Century Hotel in central Huadu, costing 180 RMB for a multiple day return. Tickets can be bought in advance or on the day of travel from a travel office located inside New Century Hotel to the right

Passengers are taken to the border, where they alight the bus to go through passport control and customs, then re-boarding on the other side. They are then taken to Prince Edward and Mong Kok areas , close to the subway stations.

Once a Work Visa has been transferred to a Residents Permit on arrival, teachers are unlimited by the number of times they can exit and re-enter Hong Kong. Rooms in Mong Kok can be had for as little as 200 RMB per night, making weekend breaks very affordable.

name: Wuhan Shane English School
description:
Introduction

 

Wuhan, the capital city of Hubei Province in central China, is situated on Jianghan Plain, a river-crossed fertile land created by the Hanjiang River joining the Yangtze River. This is a routine port for a Yangtze River cruise. Divided by the Yangtze, the city is known as the 'Three Towns of Wuhan' with Hankou and Hanyang on the west bank, and Wuchang on the east.

Reasons why Shane English Wuhan is right for you

  • A relaxed and supportive work environment.
  • A professional company that appreciates its staff.
  • All our teachers have legal work visas with no hassles.
  • We are always completely upfront with our teachers.
  • Live in one of the most amazing cities in the world.
  • Easy travel throughout China and Asia.

 

 

The school

Shane English has four branches in Wuhan. All schools are conveniently located and within easy reach of the subway line. The schools utilize a number of technologies, alongside traditional ESL teaching methods to provide a superior quality learning experience.

Places of interest and things to do

Wuhan has an old history and rich cultural traditions. There are also lots of interests here. The east lake is the pride and joy of the people of Wuhan, millions of residents here get a lot of fun out of going for a walk along the lakeside in spring, swimming in summer, appreciating sweet laurel in autumn and admiring plum in winter.The Yellow Crane Tower is one of the most famous towers on the south bank of Yangze River. The First Bridge over the Yangze River. It has made the wish of “turning a deep chasm into a thoroughfare” fulfilled.

name: Zhangjiagang Shane English School
description:
Introduction

Zhangjiagang is a county level port city under the administration of Suzhou city. Saying that it’s much closer to Wuxi! But it has very easy access to all the local big towns: Wuxi, Suzhou and of course, Shanghai. Zhangjiagang is a really exciting place to be, it’s been undergoing massive growth and transformation over the past decade, new shopping malls, western restaurants, bars and so on are constantly being built. The city can transform in front of your eyes in mere months! It’s generally an incredibly wealthy town and thus has a very high standard of living, the apartments are mostly new, well furnished and come at a cheap price in comparison to Shanghai rentals. The streets are extremely clean and the air is much purer than bigger cities such as Shanghai or Beijing. It’s not a particularly large town by China standards. There are only 1.3 million people and the main town area only has 100,000, it’s extremely easy to get around by bicycle to anywhere in the town within minutes and there are some beautiful areas to explore just outside along the Yangtze river. 

Why Shane Zhangjiagang is right for you

A small school with an enthusiastic and extremely friendly team. A professional company that appreciates its staff. Live in a modern, ever changing and beautiful Chinese city We are always up front and honest with our teachers. Easy travel to major cities nearby Immerse yourself in Chinese culture (but have easy access to home comforts)

The school

Shane English Schools are modern, well-equipped schools which utilize the latest in smart board technology to provide a stimulating, engaging learning environment. Schools are bright and well-decorated and friendly staff ensure a warm welcome for teachers and students alike.

Places Of Interest / Things To Do

Zhangjiagang is a really great place to immerse yourself in Chinese culture. The environment is extremely clean and friendly. People often say hello to you on the street and it’s very easy to make Chinese friends and immerse yourself in the community. You will have a very warm feeling living here, as most people are incredibly kind and friendly. It’s a great place to be if you’re studying Chinese!

name: Qingpu Shane English School
description:
Introduction

Qingpu is in a very convenient location. You will be placed between Central Shanghai, one of the biggest and advanced cities in the world, and Zhujiajiao, a traditional Chinese old town. Therefore you have access to two very different sides of China. Zhujiajiao is a historical ancient water town located in the west of Shanghai. It’s a beautiful and well preserved town, although in the recent years it has seen an increase in tourism, the tranquil, beautiful and romantic charm remains. It offers things that big cities fail to deliver. It’s a town full of antiquity, tranquility and most importantly, it offers a true China experience.

Reasons why Shane English Qingpu is right for you

  • A relaxed and supportive work environment.
  • A professional company that appreciates its staff.
  • All our teachers have legal work visas with no hassles.
  • We are always completely upfront with our teachers.
  • Live in one of the most amazing cities in the world.
  • Easy travel throughout China and Asia.

 

The school

Working at Shane involves many classes with very young students, this can be a challenging, but fun and enjoyable experience. At Shane, the more creative you are the better. You are given a set of guidelines for language points, but how you deliver these language points is entirely up to you. You can follow routines created by the Academic Manager and experienced teachers, or you can innovate your own classes.

Places Of Interest / Things To Do

Located on the Huangpu River, Qingpu offers exceptional views for those who love nature. Visit the ancient water town of Zhujiajiao and take a rare look into China’s past. People come from all over the world to visit China’s hidden gem. Go explore Dianshan Lake. Fondly known as “sweet water lake” by the Chinese, it is a great place to spend time.

name: Yangzhou Shane English School
description:
Introduction

Yangzhou is a mid-sized city located near the east coast in Jiangsu Province. It has a long history, with the area first settled as a garrison city in the 5th Century BC. Since then it has seen both expansion and decline in line with the tumults of Chinese history. It is relatively small by Chinese standards, with a population of about 4.5 million. Over the last decade, Yangzhou has, like many cities in China, seen a glut of building and expansion. It now hosts a range of bars, clubs, restaurants and shops. In spite of this, it has still kept its traditional charm and is an excellent option for those seeking a more authentic experience of living in China.

Yangzhou also boasts an active and close-knit expat crowd and a friendly local population to meet any new teacher's tastes for socializing, alongside a range of tourist attractions including parks, museums and galleries.

Overall, Yangzhou is a fantastically convenient, comfortable and scenic city and is a great place for those who want a balance between modern city life and more traditional Chinese living.

Why Shane Yangzhou is right for you 

 

  • Great working environment with regular opportunities for training and development. 
  • Honesty and transparency with teachers. Easy transport links to the rest of China on the high speed rail network. 
  • Two offices with plenty of support staff and colleagues to help a new teacher settle in. 
  • Well balanced city with a good mix of tradition and modernity.
  • Reasons to work for Shane English Yangzhou

 

The school

Yangzhou has two schools, both in convenient locations. The head office is situated near the coach station on the West side of the city. It has spacious classrooms, a media room, a good sized waiting room for parents and a play area where the students can occupy themselves between classes. The second school is located in the downtown area and has recently moved to a new office. Both schools are recently decorated and are comfortable places to work. In addition to the offices, the Shane has contracts with a range of schools around the city (referred to as outside locations) to provide teachers with welcome variety in their working schedule.

Places of Interest / Things To Do

Those interested in music and clubs can find live performances in many of the bars, and a range of night-clubs for dancing. Meanwhile the days can be spent in a number of the sports facilities that the city has, including astro-turf pitches, gyms, basketball and badminton courts, or wandering and cycling in one of the parks or older streets. This brings us to the city’s sights. Located in the downtown area is the beautiful Slender West lake. For a fee, this beautiful park area is a lovely place to spend a day enjoying pagodas, gardens, temples and boat rides. The city is also home to a traditional style market street where food, trinkets and tea are in abundance. Like any other city in China, Yangzhou is also home to a range of museums for those wishing to learn the story of their new home.

name: Ningbo Shane English School
description:
Introduction

Ningbo is on the southeastern coast of China, in Zhejiang province. The city is 1 hour from Hangzhou and only 2 hours from Shanghai, thanks to high-speed rail and a bridge across Hangzhou Bay. Ningbo has a charming blend of old China (hutongs, markets and temples) and the new (skyscrapers, western restaurants, music clubs, cafes).
Zhejiang, throughout most of Chinese history, has been known for its contributions to China's art and literature. Ningbo is home to the oldest private library in China, a modern art museum, galleries and theaters, and a thriving intellectual community. The city is one of the cleanest in China, thanks to progressive environmental policies like emissions restrictions and city wide recycling.

Reasons why Shane English Ningbo is right for you

  • A relaxed and supportive work environment
  • A professional company that appreciates its staff.
  • All our teachers have legal work visas with no hassles.
  • We are always completely upfront with our teachers.
  • Live in one of the most amazing cities in the world.
  • Easy travel throughout China and Asia.

 

The school

SESC Ningbo was established in the city center of Ningbo in 2004. Since then our school has gained a reputation for excellence in teaching, creativity in the classroom and a consistently evolving curriculum. We now have three schools in the Ningbo area, with 1500 students and 18 foreign staff members. Among expats in Ningbo, our school has gained a reputation for our welcoming community, fair treatment of teachers, emphasis upon professional trust and development, and outstanding teacher support through training and ongoing consultation.

Places of Interest / Things To Do

Ningbo is lucky to have a large amount of foreign restaurants and cafes catering to the large expat community, so it’s easy to find a favorite meal from back home. It’s also very easy to make foreign friends, as Ningbo has permanent residents from around the world. College age foreigners regularly pour into Nottingham University, which has a campus here, while twenty- and thirty-somethings populate the foreign teacher community. An older crowd of expats are involved in import-export businesses and small startups. There are several excellent theaters in the city which showcase a great variety of performing arts. Cinemas regularly show foreign movies. There are dozens and dozens of clubs and bars for both foreign and local crowds.

name: Aston English Dongying
description:
Dongying is one of the richest cities in the country with a GDP per person which is 50% higher than Beijing. In comparison to the larger cities, foreigners are still relatively rare and as a result the ever welcoming locals are particularly friendly. As a result of the relative wealth, there quite a lot going on in the city; there is an excellent range of restaurants, laser tag, swimming pools, artificial beaches, cinemas (occasionally with English movies) along with pool halls, ping pong clubs and quality gyms. On top of this, probably due to its relatively small size, there is still a heart warming sense of community. During the summer the square is filled with people of all ages for communal dancing, line walking and endless chit chat. Dongying is a new city, having been developed from a tiny rural village in the last thirty years. Dongying’s development has been fuelled by the discovery of oil in the early 1970’s. This discovery has made it a fascinating place to live and experience China.

There are no temples or ancient history within the city itself, instead you can see the massive growth of China’s economy in the last twenty or so years. It’s a great place to see modern China and try to really understand this continually developing nation. It is important to mention that Dongying is a very Chinese city and that it can be a challenge at times, but if you are prepared for that, then Dongying is a truly great place and you’ll have an unforgettable experience.

Dongying is situated in the North of Shandong province around 30 minutes from the coast. It is reasonably well connected to rest of China, with good train links and an airport with regular flights to Beijing and Shanghai. The lovely city of Qingdao, the home of the beer and annual beer festival, is four hours to the South-East, and other coastal cites such as Yantai and Weihai are a few hours bus away. Beijing is a five hour journey to the North and most of the rest of Shandong is accessible on weekend trips.

As mentioned Dongying’s history is only thirty or so years long. However, nearby you can find the home of Confucius and the beautiful Tai mountain. Shandong is the home of the Han Chinese and has an ancient history of more than 5000 years of history, most of which can be visited on days off.
There is a great variety of food from around the country and an excellent range in prices. In summer, the streets fill with Muslim style bbq restaurants open late into the night. There is also a reasonable range of foreign foods, including pizza places, fast food outlets, an Italian restaurant, quality western food in the large hotels and great Japanese and Korean cuisine.

The weather is remarkably consistent. There is a long hot summer and a cold winter with a short spring and autumn. The weather is very livable, although it can be a little cold or hot at the start of each new season. Strangely there is almost no rain and weather is rarely an issue.

The school

We are a small school that has just moved to a new location just of the main street in the city. It’s on the 9th floor of a modern building. The school has a large supply of teaching materials and a great group of students. The teachers are all well trained and are a friendly bunch of people.

name: Aston English Chongqing
description:
The School

Established in March 2006, Chongqing Aston School is one of the newest members of the Aston family and the second in the beautiful and historic Sichuan region. As a young school in the Aston family we are growing rapidly with current student numbers at around 350. At Aston Chongqing we offer a variety of courses which differ slightly from other schools. The school is split between regular Children’s classes and Aplus (an interactive children’s class with provided touchscreen and interactive DVD’s). We also provide classes that focus on Conversation (where the teacher is given more freedom to discuss their interests), writing and VIP.


Situated on the 4th floor of the Post Office Building in the vibrant Shapingba District on the famous three Gorges Square, we are surrounded by world class shopping, eating and numerous entertainment options on all sides. Currently our staff team includes both Western and Chinese managers, four foreign teacher, and six Chinese teachers. The front desk staff is the most charming in Aston as all five of the lovely young women speak English and are always ready to help. Formal Chinese language lessons are provided twice weekly by one of our qualified Chinese teachers.


The Teachers’ Lounge is a comfortable place to relax between classes or to plan lessons. Personal lockers, a microwave and internet access, as well as group working table all help to make it a professional and convenient environment. The school is climate controlled and comfortable in both summer and winter. We have a solid collection of resources available to our teachers for use in planning and teaching lessons. There is a very experienced team of Foreign and Chinese staff working to grow and build Aston in Chongqing. We would like to expand our school with both new ideas and suggestions. There will be plenty of opportunity for teachers to progress to management positions and/or move to other schools in our city of Chongqing in the future.

The apartments

 

All of our foreign teachers’ accommodations are nearby; just off the main three Gorges square that is the heart of Shapingba. As you walk across the square to the school you can feel the energy as the hustle and flow of so many people go about their daily lives during your fifteen-minute stroll, (it really is an easy ten minutes but sometimes you have to wait for elevators), it would be quite difficult to get apartments closer to the school. Located all in the same complex the apartments, not only have their own private security, but residents also have access to a small private park where it is not uncommon to see people using the exercise equipment or playing Mahjong.

Chongqing Aston provides its foreign teaching staff some of the nicest accommodation in the Aston system. Apartments are modern in every way, close to the school, and in the heart of one of the most bustling urban districts in the nation. Internet and cable TV are already wired or you can choose to frequent one of the many internet bars in the area. Also, in addition our dedicated Apartment Manager Sara is always on call to help.

In addition to a truly fantastic collection of delicious and authentic local Chinese restaurants and shops nearby, the square provides easy access to Pizza Hut, KFC, a 24-hour McDonalds, Starbucks, Japanese, Korean, and Southeast Asian food. Several steak houses and other Western style establishments are also popular in the area. If cooking at home is more your style there is a Carrefour (French owned Wal-Mart clone) in the square that stocks many Western style food items, (including Western toiletries, cheese, breads, and wines). Entertainment abounds with several clubs, KTV, western style bars, and numerous coffee houses all within minutes of Chongqing Aston and the apartments.

name: Aston English Yantai
description:
The city

Yantai is pleasantly breezy city overlooking the Liaodong Peninsula in Shandong Province (Google Earth: 37°32’01.29”N, 121°24’00.65”E). According to the Chinese State Statistics Bureau, Yantai ranks 33/50 economic power in China. It’s a modern, forward-thinking, and well-developed (and developing) place. Yantai is an ambitious city with big plans in the near future to increase trade with America, Japan, and particularly South Korea – and this can be illustrated by its huge, booming docklands.

Yantai has the usual range of restaurants and food styles you can expect to find anywhere in China, but it also has a rich supply of fresh sea food. There are also many Korean style restaurants and BBQs to be found here. The main thoroughfare, Nan Da Jie, sports all the retail you could want, from high-end electronics and designer clothes to the low-end night markets. Most big supermarkets have a small western imports section as well. Some of the sights to see include the Changyu wine museum, Peng Lai City – the fabled landing site of the Eight Immortals, and the many beaches and promenades and swimming areas that pepper the coastline. Nightlife consists of nightclubs, bars, outdoor BBQ, and the picturesque Chaoyang Street (commonly known as Bar Street). If that isn’t your thing – you can learn salsa dancing or tai chi on the promenade, or take a boat ride across the bay.

The school

Yantai Aston English School opened in June 2008. The school is situated downtown in Zhifu district - a mixture of old and new architecture, away from the docklands main. The school design is new, modern, and clean. And, in keeping with Aston’s new design plan, there is a big screen LCD TV in the lobby for movie nights. Our teachers lounge is spacious and comfortable, with lockers, a microwave, and a new computer all in English.

The school is situated on the corner of Xi Nan He Lu and Bei Da Xi Jie, on the second floor – you can’t miss the signs. The surrounding area has many little side streets offering all sorts of things, from cheap street food to the occasional curio. Nan Da Jie (the main downtown street) is about a five minute walk from school, and Wal-Mart, KFC, and McDonalds are only about ten minutes away. Also within walking distance are the Yantai Shan Lighthouse Park and promenade, and Yu Huang Ding Park, two most relaxing locations.

The apartments

As Yantai Aston is pretty new, we only have two apartments for foreign staff. The teachers’ apartment is located in the heart of downtown – it’s only a 5-10 minute walk to Aston, Walmart, KFC, McDonalds, and a few coffee shops and tea houses. In the immediate neighborhood there are also supermarkets, outdoor markets, restaurants, shopping malls, shops, and plenty of street food. About a 15-20 minute walk up the main street there is a Parkson shopping mall where you can find shops, cinemas, restaurants, fast food places (including Pizza Hut and Ajisen Ramen), bowling, pool, and possibly the best supermarket in town – RT Mart. And, if you want to travel away from the city centre, there are plenty of buses heading in all directions.

The apartment itself is located on the fourth floor of a building slightly off the main street. There are two bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, a bathroom, and an area off one bedroom where you can store things or hang laundry. There’s plenty of closet and shelf space. In the kitchen there are two gas burners on the stove, a microwave, a large water bottle, a large fridge, and a washing machine.

The apartment for the foreign manager is also on the fourth floor, but not as centrally located. It’s about a 20 minute walk from Parkson, which is about another 20 minutes away from Aston. However, you can catch a bus that drops you in front of McDonalds (which is close to the school). Or you can catch a relatively cheap cab. The neighborhood is not far from downtown, but there isn’t much in the area except some restaurants, and a nice outdoor area, and market across the street.

This apartment has three rooms (though one is not really furnished). One bedroom has a bed, bureau, wardrobe, couch, TV, and an air conditioner/heater. There’s also a sunroom area for hanging up laundry. The other bedroom has a bed, coffee table, two arm chairs, a desk, and an air conditioner/heater. The kitchen and bathroom are equipped with the same things as the teachers’ apartment.

name: Aston English Zaozhuang
description:
Aston

Since 1996 Aston English has helped over 1500 teachers experience China and we offer a simple and efficient recruitment procedure with recruitment professionals with you every step of the way. Zaozhuang Aston in Shandong Province is part of the Aston Education Group which was established in 1996 and now is largest chain of American managed schools in China and we welcome applications from experienced, motivated and enthusiastic people for an immediate start to work with Zaozhuang Aston. 

We are seeking Native English Speakers from Canada, Australia, New Zealand, England, America or Ireland or any country where English is your FIRST language. The candidates must have at least 1 years experience a college degree and some type of TEFL certification. Teachers who are already in China who have successfully completed their contract with their present school are welcome to apply.

Zaozhuang Aston provides you with full training, guidance and support to enable you to become a great teacher. All candidates should be responsible, hard working, energetic, creative and fun loving to teach English to children 4 to 17 years of age.

The Teacher Trainer role is an integral role in the AEG education system having the responsibility for all aspects of Educational Quality and training within the school and to develop and implement the educational philosophy of the school and to develop a culture of best practice among the teaching team. You will need a commitment to teambuilding and be able to motivate and lead a team of international teachers from diverse backgrounds.

Main duties: 

Duties and Responsibilities – Included but not limited to:
•Orientate new teachers to AEG’s teaching standards
•Organize and run the Teacher Certification Course for new teachers.
•Provide advice and coaching to teachers in their teaching role
•Observe teachers and provide developmental feedback
•Provide one to one coaching sessions for teachers
•Build up a set of teaching resources to assist teachers with their teaching
•Work with the Director of Education and Human Resources to further develop a syllabus framework for the school

Aston has developed our own detailed curriculum for beginner, elementary, intermediate and advanced students. Each level includes teacher’s guides jam packed with ideas and strategies that gives you the in classroom support you need to enable you to bring out the best from students of all abilities.

Since 1996 Aston English has helped over 3500 teachers experience China and we offer a simple and efficient recruitment procedure with Recruitment Professionals with you every step of the way as you embark on your career in China.

name: Aston English Tengzhou
description:
The city

Tengzhou is located in the south of the Shangdong Province and is proud of the hometown of Mo-tse. This revered gentleman was a highly regarded ancient thinker, educator, scientist, military strategist and social activist. Tengzhou is economically developed with a population of about 1.8 million.

There are numerous scenic spots, including but not limited to, the Red Lotus Wetland Park and Lianqing Mountain. It is also close to other tourist attractions, which include the ancient city of Taierzhuang and the largest pomegranate orchard in the world. Tengzhou is a comfortable and inviting place to live and travel that is very well connected to the rest of the province by highway and fast-train network.

The school

Tengzhou Aston has been open since 2011. We are situated right in the middle of Jinghe Road, opposite to Luban Hotel. The school’s location is very nice. There are 5 banks, 6 large shopping sites, 2 KFCs, 2 cafes and many restaurants in easy walking distance of our school. The school staff are very friendly and always willing to go out of our way to help a wayward foreign teacher who needs a bit of help getting through their day.

The apartments

Aston Tengzhou currently maintains two apartments for its staff, both are well equipped. There are sofa, fridge, gas stoves, cabinets and high speed internet. The teacher’s apartment is very near the school in a lovely central location to numerous amenities.

Top reasons for choosing Tengzhou

 

  • Downtown location – easy getting to class, by foot or by bus
  • Convenient transportation to many lovely cities and historical sites.
  • Very close to the birth place of Confucius.
  • Rapid trains to several major Chinese cities. Beijing is 5 hours away by high speed train.
  • Qingdao is a short train journey for delightful seaside activities.
  • Tengzhou is a very quiet and relaxing city. None of the hustle and bustle of a major Chinese city, but several major cities a short distance away.
  • Friendly local people.
  • Local specialty dishes including incredibly delicious vegetable pancakes mutton stew.
  • The apartment is in a central location of three large supermarkets.
  • Several internet cafes are directly across the street from the teacher’s apartment and school.

name: English School attached to Guangdong University of Foreign Studies
description: At the English School attached to Guangdong University of Foriegn Studies there are two international programs. A Canadian program (SCP) and an American program (SAP). In each of these programs the students take all of their classes in English, and are taught by foriegn teachers. The school also hires ESL teachers for younger students.

name: Ningbo Foreign Language School
description:
Ningbo Foreign Language School (NBFLS) is a full-time school approved by Ningbo municipal government office in 1991 and filed by State Education Department, provincial Government Office, provincial Economy Planning Committee and provincial Education Department accordingly. It’s run by Xiaoshi Middle School (Xiaoshi) with the same teaching and administrative staff. In 1999, it was accepted as the 18th member school of the National Foreign Language School Association. In 2000, it was approved by the municipal government that NBFLS would be funded by non-state forces and experience a transitional period in Xiaoshi. In September 2005, NBFLS was relocated to the present site, 26 Yucai Road, and is still run by Xiaoshi.

Over the past fifteen years, NBFLS has been exploring new ways to run well a foreign language school, guided by the state educational policies and based on the theories put forth by the State Education Department. Our aims are to help students to form scientific attitudes to knowledge, and to initiate actively the pioneering spirit of practical innovations. Following the laws of developing youths and meeting the demands of society, we’ve created an atmosphere for students to develop their own personalities

Over the past fifteen years, NBFLS has received several visiting delegations of teachers and students from the States, Australia, Japan, Singapore and Germany and has established friendship with HopkingsSchool in the U.S.A., PerthCollege in Scotland, YishunJunior College, ChineseHigh School and Nanyang Girls’ High School in Singapore. More than 30 teachers in NBFLS have been sent to the U.S.A., the UK, Germany, Hong Kong and Singapore to advance their language ability as well as their view of culture.

Since 1991, NBFLS has witnessed the graduation of 1638 junior students, among whom about 1200 students have been enrolled in Xiaoshi High School, and up till 2005, 797 students have graduated from Xiaoshi, of whom 90% went to prestigious universities in China. Besides, since 1996, 48 NBFLS junior graduates have won the scholarship given by the Singaporean government and have been admitted to Chinese High School and Nanyang Girls’ High School in Singapore, of whom more than 20 students have been accepted by world-famous universities, such as Harvard, Stanford, Yale, MIT in America, Cambridge University, Oxford University in Britain and Singapore State University for their bachelors, masters or doctorate degrees.

With the support of Ningbo municipal government and Ningbo municipal Education Bureau, and with the concern of all the citizens in Ningbo, NBFLS will embark on a new journey at its new campus aiming to be the top school in Ningbo.

name: Ningbo Institute of Technology, Zhejiang University
description:
Ningbo Institute of Technology, ZhejiangUniversity, abbreviated as NIT, was founded in 2001 with the approval of the People’s Government of Zhejiang Province. Funded over 840 million RMB yuan by the People’s Government of Ningbo Municipality and administered by ZhejiangUniversity, NIT is a full-time institution of higher education which acts as an independent legal entity. It is located on over 80 hectares in the Ningbo Higher Education Zone, with a total floor space of more than 330,000 square meters.

With the influential support of Zhejiang University (ZJU) through its discipline preponderance, NIT sets the specialties closely based on social demands. The institute currently comprises sight schools with thirty one specialities, including School of Information Science and Engineering, School of Biological and Chemical Engineering, School of Mechanical, Electrical and Energy Engineering, School of Civil and Architectural Engineering, School of Foreign Languages, School of Law Science and Media, School of Economicsand Trade, as well as School of Management. At present, it holds over 11,000 full-time students.

NIT carries out a unique operational method of its own―the chief professor system to enhance the teaching quality of foundation courses. The chief professors are all renowned ones of ZJU, and the department deans and chief professors of the specialities are also leaders and/or professors of the corresponding colleges of ZJU. While fitted in with the overall educational plan of ZJU, NIT’s teaching contents and materials, set according to ZJU’s, has its own distinctive features. The teaching quality and standards are guaranteed by assigning major courses to experienced full professors and associate professors from ZJU. NIT students are cultivated in the style as required by ZJU and diplomas are conferred on the students by NIT. And those who satisfy the specific requirements set by ZJU can be awarded the bachelor degree by ZJU.

NIT has inherited and will carry forward the spirit of "seeking truth and being innovative" characterized by ZJU. NIT strives for a high-quality creative personnel development system based on an up-to-date educational concept. With a strong team of faculty member

name: Web International English Huangpu
description:
Web Education Group first opened its doors in 1998, the goal to provide Chinese people with a better and more effective way of learning English. To do this we created a unique Three-Stage Multi-Discipline Learning Method and combined it with one of the world’s most advanced courseware providers. Web was immediately successful and since founding has established more than 72 centers across China, we've got centres in: Shanghai, Guangzhou, Dalian, Chongqing, Hangzhou, Ningbo and many more.

The working week is 40 hours, of which 25 hours are teaching. Classes are mostly small in size and have teaching materials prepared for you. We keep the office duties are minimal; we don’t spend time correcting tests or homework or doing much lesson planning in the office.

Lessons plans are already made for all Private and Salon Classes to make preparation easier. Rather than long preparation times teachers just have to review the lesson plan before class and review any vocabulary or grammar structures they are not familiar with.

Preparation for a Social Club may time, however, especially if it’s a topic of the teacher’s choosing and he or she needs to create the lesson plan and material. There may be other minor duties as well, another member of our staff might need a teacher to perform a level test for a student, or a student might need a teacher to correct grammar of a presentation they’re preparing for presentation class.

name: Disney English Haidian
description:
At Disney English, you will experience a new culture, give the gift of language to children across China and work with a well-loved and global brand. In a career with Disney English you will have the opportunity to influence the lives of our young learners in unique ways by utilizing award-winning curriculum through storytelling, innovation and fun - while guiding them on the road to success. We invite you to learn, grow and succeed with a team that loves what they do. We invite you to be Disney.

Orientation usually starts on the Monday after arrival in China and is followed by 7 days of academic training. During orientation and training, cast members learn about Disney English, the content/curriculum, service standards and the interactive technology. Disney English provides a developed curriculum that is robust, engaging, and interactive and is inclusive of scope and sequence. Every lesson includes planned activities and targets. During training, new cast members will have the opportunity to practice and present lessons. Casual business attire is required for academic training.

Foreign Trainers spend 40 hours per week in their centers, of which approximately 20-25 are contact hours. The remainder of the time is spent preparing lessons, conducting demonstration lessons for potential students and their parents to help market our program, hosting referral events, attending staff meetings and engaging in other center activities as needed. Academic cast members work a 5-day week, shifts do not start earlier than 8:30am and end no later than 9:00pm. Question: Will I have weekends off?

Saturdays and Sundays are Disney English's busiest (and longest days) at the centers. Cast members are required to work both days, and can expect that one of the days will have a 12-hour shift. Cast members will receive 2 consecutive days off during the week, to serve as a "weekend". Usually the days off are either Tuesday/Wednesday or Wednesday/Thursday.


Disney English provides English classes for children ages 2 through 12 years old. There are 3 programs offered:


Hello World: 2 year olds
Foundation: 3-6 year olds
Step Up: 7 year olds +

No class will exceed 15 learners. Using a team training approach, all Foreign Trainers are paired with a Chinese Learning Partner for all classroom time.

Disney English provides the TEFL-C course as a no cost benefit to all Foreign Academic cast members. All foreign academic staff at Disney English are TEFL-C (Teaching English as a Foreign Language to Children) certified. The program, which is affiliated with Columbia University Teachers' College, consists of 20 on-line modules. Foreign cast members MUST complete all 20 online modules prior to starting with Disney English. Once on-board, 15 hours of live training are provided, as part of on-boarding and training. The remaining 13 online modules MUST be completed within 3 months of arrival. The hard copies of the TEFL-C certificates will be provided upon completion of the course.

Disney English centers are currently opened in 9 cities throughout China—Beijing, Chengdu, Wuhan, Shanghai, Suzhou, Hangzhou, Nanjing, Guangzhou and Shenzhen. Disney English will continue its expansion into other cities throughout China in the coming years.

name: Trumptech (aka. Foshan Jinghe Education)
description: With a main office in Hong Kong and a branch in Foshan, Trumptech was originally an IT company that recently reconverted itself as an education provider, partnering with public schools across the Foshan area.

Cast members will receive 2 consecutive days off during the week, to serve as a "weekend". Usually the days off are either Tuesday/Wednesday or Wednesday/Thursday.

The programs

Disney English provides English classes for children ages 2 through 12 years old. There are 3 programs offered:

Hello World: 2 year olds
Foundation: 3-6 year olds
Step Up: 7 year olds +

No class will exceed 15 learners. Using a team training approach, all Foreign Trainers are paired with a Chinese Learning Partner for all classroom time.

Disney English provides the TEFL-C course as a no cost benefit to all Foreign Academic cast members. All foreign academic staff at Disney English are TEFL-C (Teaching English as a Foreign Language to Children) certified. The program, which is affiliated with Columbia University Teachers' College, consists of 20 on-line modules. Foreign cast members MUST complete all 20 online modules prior to starting with Disney English. Once on-board, 15 hours of live training are provided, as part of on-boarding and training. The remaining 13 online modules MUST be completed within 3 months of arrival. The hard copies of the TEFL-C certificates will be provided upon completion of the course.

Locations

Disney English centers are currently opened in 9 cities throughout China—Beijing, Chengdu, Wuhan, Shanghai, Suzhou, Hangzhou, Nanjing, Guangzhou and Shenzhen. Disney English will continue its expansion into other cities throughout China in the coming years.

In a career with Disney English you will have the opportunity to influence the lives of our young learners in unique ways by utilizing award-winning curriculum through storytelling, innovation and fun - while guiding them on the road to success. We invite you to learn, grow and succeed with a team that loves what they do. We invite you to be Disney.

Orientation usually starts on the Monday after arrival in China and is followed by 7 days of academic training. During orientation and training, cast members learn about Disney English, the content/curriculum, service standards and the interactive technology. Disney English provides a developed curriculum that is robust, engaging, and interactive and is inclusive of scope and sequence. Every lesson includes planned activities and targets. During training, new cast members will have the opportunity to practice and present lessons. Casual business attire is required for academic training.

Foreign Trainers spend 40 hours per week in their centers, of which approximately 20-25 are contact hours.
